translations.en:
: ** :fish: As you pass a lake, you notice a man who seems to be having difficulties on his fishing trip!

:fishing_pole_and_fish: Offer your help.
:runner: Keep going, no time to waste! 
:hand_splayed: Push the fisherman into the water!

*-Use reaction to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
